article_title: Four Reasons The Affordable Care Act Is A Boon To Entrepreneurs

article_metadata.author: My Say

og.description: At first glance, the Affordable Care Act looks bad for business. Businesses now face higher taxes and more stringent requirements for insuring their employees. Part-time work is gaining traction as a response to the law's requirements.  However, despite these highly-publicized downsides, the ACA has a number of stipulations that help [...]
